description:
Job Title: MERN Developer
Experience Required: 7+ Years

Job Description:

We are looking for an experienced MERN Developer to join our team. The ideal candidate will have expertise in Node.js/TypeScript and React, with knowledge of Next.js and Material-UI being a plus. Experience with AWS Cloud technologies, particularly CDK and Lambda functions, is essential, along with strong skills in relational databases and CI/CD pipelines.

Key Skills:
Strong development experience in Node.js/TypeScript and React.
Familiarity with Next.js and Material-UI.
Hands-on experience with AWS Cloud services, especially CDK and Lambdas.
Proficiency in Jest, Vitest, Cypress, or similar testing tools.
Knowledge of CI/CD pipelines and DevOps practices.

Nice to Haves:
Experience with RESTful APIs and WebSockets.
Basic knowledge of Linux, Docker, and AWS SysOps.
AWS Certifications are a plus.
This role offers an exciting opportunity to work with cutting-edge cloud technologies in a fast-paced environment!
